item.title: Motion Graphics Video Editor needed for VSL editing - Upwork
item.description:
THE MAIN TASK:
- I actually need an editor specializing in motion graphics to create social media ads just like/better than this one:
https://app.foreplay.co/share/ads/kr0C2CJhLZteLPL7SUmA?user=Dan%20Ragan

Please send in a sample of your work that is similar to this ^

THE OPPORTUNITY
- Our UGC ad agency (http://www.ugcfactory.io) is seeking a part-time video editor responsible for editing VSL's for me.

WHY WORK WITH ME?
- 10+ years experience building organizations from the ground up, managing teams of 15+ full-time employees, ensuring project milestones are hit, and consistently delivering for clients on-time and within budget.
- I'm dedicated to ongoing learning and make sure I share this knowledge with the people I work with. You'll have access to my proprietary database of productivity tools + tutorials + recommendations, something I've invested thousands of hours + dollars to create and regularly maintain.
- Developed automation systems that deliver results with limited resources... and form the backbone of my approach to organization building.

Hourly Range: $40.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 11:54 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Advertisement, Testimonial Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Animation, Mixed Media
Skills: Advertisement, Testimonial Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Animation, Mixed Media
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Music video/art - Upwork
item.description:
I make music. I need a music video. Specifically, I need an animation of a man that has starts out "black and white" walking through a forest/nature and then as the song gets brighter, more colors show. Once the end of the track hits, I want it to be bright and pastel.

I require good communication, initiative, creative mindset and positive approach. Attached is the song. Willing to negotiate pending skillset and initiative/creative mindset that matches this project. There will be more projects in future if you do well. Thank you.

Hourly Range: $28.00-$46.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 11:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:AI-Generated Video, Music Video, Video Production
Skills: AI-Generated Video, Music Video, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
